title: How many smartphone manufactures are there in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: As there are around more than 10 indian mobile brand but, very less makes smartphone .some as micromax , intex ,LYF, LAVA make smarphone .these brands were doing well before Chinese brands come in Indian market. Micromax and intex both were top brand at one time before ,as now Chinese covered as 75% indian smartphone market.they are just selling smartphone in India as India is now biggest smartphone market . Indian brands now can acclerate by launching smartphones with new features and new models.
